body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       The National Park Service has provided the following articles to enlighten the visitor about safety risks within the park:    "The Poison Ivy & Kin Factsheet" "Ticks Factsheet"   For additional information we encourage the visitor to call the park ahead of time, make inquiries at the visitor center, or check the alerts on the park's website.
title: Sagamore Hill National Historic Site: Safety
